heading: This Website!
description: I wanted to make my own personal website that showcased my coding projects, accomplishments, as well as me as a person!

heading: BoomBox
description: BoomBox is an application that I came up with, where you can set up a profile and post reviews of albums, add albums to your favourites list, and add albums to a listen list. Ultimately, you can connect with others about shared love of music!
